sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
      <v-row>
        <v-col>
          <v-timeline>
            <v-timeline-item
              v-for="(day, index) in itinerary"
              :key="index"
              :color="getTimelineColor(index)"
            >
              <v-timeline-item-icon>
                <v-icon>{{ getTimelineIcon(index) }}</v-icon>
              </v-timeline-item-icon>
  
              <v-timeline-item-content>
                <v-card>
                  <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="12" md="4">
                      <!-- Display image for the day -->
                      <v-img :src="getDayImage(day.title)" height="150"></v-img>
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="12" md="8">
                      <v-card-title class="headline">{{ day.title }}</v-card-title>
                      <v-card-text>
                        <!-- Display activities for the day with images -->
                        <v-list>
                          <v-list-item v-for="(activity, i) in day.activities" :key="i">
                            <v-list-item-avatar>
                              <v-img :src="getActivityImage(activity)" size="40"></v-img>
                            </v-list-item-avatar>
                            <v-list-item-content>{{ activity }}</v-list-item-content>
                          </v-list-item>
                        </v-list>
                      </v-card-text>
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                </v-card>
              </v-timeline-item-content>
            </v-timeline-item>
          </v-timeline>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        itinerary: [
          {
            title: 'Day 1',
            activities: [
              'Morning Hike',
              'Visit Museum',
              'Lunch at Local Restaurant',
            ],
          },
          {
            title: 'Day 2',
            activities: [
              'Explore City Landmarks',
              'Afternoon Spa',
              'Dinner at Waterfront',
            ],
          },
          // Add more days as needed
        ],
      };
    },
    methods: {
      getTimelineColor(index) {
        const colors = ['primary', 'info', 'success', 'error', 'warning'];
        return colors[index % colors.length];
      },
      getTimelineIcon(index) {
        const icons = [
          'mdi-hiking',
          'mdi-map-marker',
          'mdi-spa',
          'mdi-food',
          'mdi-coffee',
        ];
        return icons[index % icons.length];
      },
      getDayImage(dayTitle) {
        // Import image from src folder
        return require `@/assets/nyc.jpeg`;
      },
      getActivityImage(activity) {
        // Import image from src folder
        return require(`@/assets/${activity.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}-nyc.jpeg`);
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
